body: Are we using `FunctionFlags` anywhere outside of autogenerated code? If its only purpose is computing `next_functions`, then we could remove `requires_grad` from it and save some work
body_html: Are we using FunctionFlags anywhere outside of autogenerated code? If its only purpose is computing next_functions, then we could remove requires_grad from it and save some work
